#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define mp make_pair
#define f first
#define s second
using namespace std;
int grid[2010][2010];
bool ans[2010][2010],con[2010][2010];
typedef pair<int,int> pii;
typedef pair<int,pii> piii;
priority_queue<piii> heap;
int main()
{
	int n,m,i,j,k,row[]={-1,-1,-1,0,0,1,1,1},col[]={-1,0,1,-1,1,-1,0,1};
	piii a;
	cin>>m>>n;
	for(i=1;i<=m;i++)
		for(j=1;j<=n;j++)
			cin>>grid[i][j];
	cin>>i>>j;
	bool flag=0;
	con[i][j]=1;
	heap.push(mp(-grid[i][j],mp(i,j)));
	k=grid[i][j];
	while(1)
	{
		while(!heap.empty())
		{
			a=heap.top();
			if(-a.f > k)
				break;
			heap.pop();
			ans[a.s.f][a.s.s]=1;
			for(int l=0;l<8;l++)
			{
				i=a.s.f+row[l];
				j=a.s.s+col[l];
				if(i<1 || j<1 || i>m || j>n)
					flag=1;
				else
				{
					if(!con[i][j])
					{
						con[i][j]=1;
						heap.push(mp(-grid[i][j],mp(i,j)));
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if(flag)
			break;
		a=heap.top();
		k=-a.f;
	}
	for(i=1;i<=m;i++)
	{
		for(j=1;j<=n;j++)
			cout<<ans[i][j]<<' ';
		cout<<'\n';
	}
	return 0;
}
